name: DesignerNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Provides daily news for designers, from the following feeds:
Designer News (designernews.co)

Feed can be enabled/disabled from the Alexa app via Settings > Flash Briefing.
